commit.message:
Rollup merge of #101573 - lcnr:param-kind-ord, r=BoxyUwU

update `ParamKindOrd`

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/90207#discussion_r767160854 :grin:

writing comments "for future prs" sure works well :3

r? `@BoxyUwU`
